MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML12 postcode area of Biggar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm to transfer power back to mains supply after changing faulty equipment in the area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7pm on 15th December 2020.
